name: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant, v. Martin F. HORN, Secretary of Corrections of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee

parties: Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant, v. Martin F. HORN, Secretary of Corrections of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 5th day of October, 1999, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
739 A.2d 1052
Raymond J. SMOLSKY, Appellant, v. Martin F. HORN, Secretary of Corrections of the Commonwealth of Pennsylvania, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 5, 1999.
